thread.title: Baltimore Ravens at San Francisco 49ers: Start time, TV channel, how to live stream online
thread.title_full: Baltimore Ravens at San Francisco 49ers: Start time, TV channel, how to live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Baltimore Ravens at San Francisco 49ers: Start time, TV channel, how to live stream online
text:
San Francisco quarterback Colin Kaepernick has been criticized often this season, and for good reason. Kaepernick hadn't performed well in recent games, but he played his best game of the season in the 30-27 loss at the New York Giants. He hopes to produce a second straight strong performance when the 49ers host the Ravens on Sunday Night Football (KGW-8 (NBC), 5:25 p.m. PT/8:25 p.m. ET).
Kaepernick completed 23-of-35 passes for 262 yards, two touchdowns and no interceptions. Kaepernick had completed a combined 22-of-44 passes for 227 yards and five interceptions in his previous two games. It's no surprise the 49ers kept the game against the Giants. Why? Kaepernick didn't throw an interception.
Baltimore coach John Harbaugh said he's got enough to worry about than wondering why his brother Jim Harbaugh is no longer the coach for the 49ers. The Ravens may not have wide receiver Steve Smith for the game. Smith is nursing a back injury and if he can't go, quarterback Joe Flacco will rely on running back Justin Forsett and then challenge a 49ers secondary that has had trouble containing receivers throughout the season.
If you want to watch the 49ers face the Ravens, here's what you need to know:
What : Baltimore Ravens at San Francisco 49ers
Where : Levi's Stadium, Santa Clara, CA
When : Sunday, Oct. 18, 1 p.m. PT/4 p.m. ET
TV : KOIN-6 (CBS)
Watch online : You can watch the live stream online on DirecTV's live stream package.
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
